text: Albert Krajmer (23 April 1933 – 10 February 2014) was a Slovak rower who competed for Czechoslovakia. He competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne with the men's double sculls where they were eliminated in the round one repêchage. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czechoslovak male rowers Category:Slovak male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:People from Nové Zámky District Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Albert Krajmer
